categories: Category:Jedi trainees of the Jedi Order

nodes.text: Hallen was a female Zabrak Jedi Padawan who served the Jedi Order during the Cold War between the Galactic Republic and the Sith Empire.

A Force-sensitive Zabrak, Hallen was discovered during her adolescent years by the Jedi Order and taken to the Jedi Temple on Tython to begin trained in the ways of the Force as a Padawan during the Cold War between the Galactic Republic and the Sith Empire. She delievered a message from Jedi Master Yuon Par to her Padawan telling the apprentice to practice martial arts, pointing him out to Master Wettle, who could train the Padawan in the arts.
